Description:
The system should give a provision of 13 digits CNIC input to the user on 
‘CNIC Input’ page.
The system should validate user’s entered CNIC on 'CNIC Input' page.

The system should allow user to set a 5-digit passcode on the 'Set 
Passcode' page.

The system should generate an OTP to complete the registration process 
once the user sets a passcode.

After successful verification of the OTP, the user will be registered in the 
DLP system.
